title: Amid fears Russia will invade Ukraine, Putin points finger at U.S. and NATO in marathon news conference
content:
1. Amid fears Russia will invade Ukraine, Putin points finger at U.S. and NATO in marathon news conference  The Washington Post
  2. Putin Says Further NATO Expansion Toward East Is Unacceptable  Bloomberg Politics
  3. Former US ambassador to Russia says Putin's 'acting crazy' over Ukraine  Business Insider
  4. Russian President Vladimir Putin warns the West over Ukraine  Reuters
  5. Putin Praises U.S. Response to Security Proposals as 'Positive'  Bloomberg
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Amid fears Russia will invade Ukraine, Putin points finger at U.S. and NATO in marathon news conference  The Washington Post

Russian President Vladimir Putin warns the West over Ukraine  Reuters

localize.title: ロシアのウクライナ侵攻が懸念される中、プーチン大統領はマラソン記者会見で米国とNATOに矛先を向けた。
在对俄罗斯将入侵乌克兰的担忧中，普京在马拉松式的新闻发布会上将矛头指向美国和北约
在對俄羅斯將入侵烏克蘭的擔憂中，普京在馬拉松式的新聞發佈會上將矛頭指向美國和北約
